summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, you can choose 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster on your opponent's field. If you do, your opponent cannot attack with that monster during their next turn.
